meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immense.
meanings.sent1: The immensenesses of the mountain range took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The immensenesses of the ocean filled me with awe.
meanings.sent3: The immensenesses of the cake at the party made everyone's eyes widen.
meanings.sent4: The immensenesses of the task ahead seemed insurmountable.
meanings.sent5: The immensenesses of the forest engulfed us in its grandeur.

meanings.definition: The vastness or enormity of something.
meanings.sent1: The immensenesses of the desert stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent2: The immensenesses of the universe are beyond our comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The immensenesses of the ice cream sundae made my eyes widen in delight.
meanings.sent4: The immensenesses of her love for him knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The immensenesses of the canyon below took our breath away.
